<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Create Financial Request">d36f6dc9479275101c89dffe046d4311</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:49c9758947d275101c89dffe046d43d0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>category on screen</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var category = g_form.getValue('category');
   g_form.addInfoMessage(category);
  
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-03 17:53:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1454a18947ef71101c89dffe046d438c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>category on screen</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Service Management" source="x_1106871_financ_0">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Service Management">aba95e8c471e31101c89dffe046d437d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1454a18947ef71101c89dffe046d438c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-03 18:08:00</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>1</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
